common.pending_withdrawal_tooltip: DA MEKBOY IS COUNTIN' YER TEEF. HOLD YER SQUIGS.

descriptions.innerLoop: Signal → Stomp → Risk → Rebalance → Loot → More Dakka

journey.title: GET KRUMPIN' IN 3 STEPS
journey.step_one_copy: SIGN UP, GET A LOUD WARCRY, AN' START COLLECTIN' TEEF.
journey.step_two_copy: PICK HOW YA WANNA FIGHT. LOTS'A WAYS TA GET MORE DAKKA.
journey.step_three_copy: GO TO DA BITZ PILE, MAKE YERSELF LOOK PROPA ORKY, DEN GET MORE LOOT!

shop.title: DA GOBBO'S SHOPPE
shop.subtitle: GET YER SHINY BITZ 'ERE. SPEND YER EXTRA TEEFS FOR CHEAPER GUBBINZ!

discretionary.title: DA BIG PLANZ IZ COMIN'
discretionary.description: DA MEKBOYZ ARE MAKIN' CHARTS 'N SQUIGGLY LINES TA SHOW HOW GOOD WE'RE KRUMPIN'. BE READY.

reserve.title: DA TEEF COUNTER IZ COMIN'
reserve.description: A BIG CHART TA SHOW HOW MANY TEEF WE GOT AND WHEN WE GOT 'EM. IT'LL BE DED SHINY.

farming.title: DA SNEAKY GITZ TRACKA IZ COMIN'
farming.description: DIS'LL SHOW ALL DA SNEAKY DEALS WE'RE DOIN' TA GET FREE LOOT FROM DA 'UMIES. MORE KRUMPIN' VOLUME, MORE LOOT!

shop.title: DA SHOP'S COMIN' SOON
shop.description: DA GOBBOS ARE STILL FINDIN' STUFF TO SELL. COME BACK LATER FOR MORE DAKKA AND SHINY BITZ.

marketplace.title: DA BITZ MARKET'S COMIN' SOON
marketplace.description: A PLACE TA SWAP YER SHINY BITZ WIF OTHER ORKS. GET YER COLLECTION BIGGA!

dashboard.welcome_subtitle: YA CAN'T FIGHT WIF NO TEEF. GO TO DA TEEF PILE, GET SOME SHINIES, DEN GO PICK A STOMPA.
dashboard.no_data: COULDN'T GET DA INFO. PROBABLY SNEAKY GITS.
dashboard.error_fetch: COULDN'T GET DA INFO. PROBABLY SNEAKY GITS.

vault_transfer_modal.title: MOVE BOYZ BETWEEN STOMPAS
vault_transfer_modal.subtitle: YA GOT {{amount}} TEEFS IN DA {{vaultName}} STOMPA TA MOVE.
vault_transfer_modal.risk_ack_link: I KNOWS DIS AIN'T INSTANT AND I READ DA <1>BIG RULEZ</1> FOR DA NEW STOMPA.
vault_transfer_modal.processing_notice: DA BOYZ ARE ON DA MOVE! IT'LL TAKE A BIT.
vault_transfer_modal.error_failed: DA BOYZ GOT LOST. TRY AGAIN.

vault_modal.title: SEND BOYZ TO DA {{vaultName}} STOMPA!
vault_modal.success: Boyz sent! Da mekboyz are on it.
vault_modal.error_nan: PUT IN REAL TEEF NUMBERS, YA GIT!
vault_modal.error_insufficient: YA DON'T GOT ENOUGH TEEFS, YA GIT!
vault_modal.error_failed: SUMFIN' WENT WRONG. TRY KRUMPIN' IT AGAIN.
vault_modal.terms_ack_link: I'VE SEEN DA <1>BIG RULEZ</1> AN' I'M READY TA FIGHT.

vault_withdraw_modal.title: GET BOYZ OUTTA DA {{vaultName}} STOMPA
vault_withdraw_modal.processing_notice: REQUEST SENT! DA MEKBOYZ ARE GETTIN' YER TEEF.
vault_withdraw_modal.error_failed: DA BOYZ DON'T WANNA LEAVE. TRY AGAIN.

wallet.title: DA TEEF PILE
wallet.toggle_balance_tooltip: STOP STARIN' OR TAKE A PEEK
wallet.withdraw_funds_subtitle: GET YER TEEFS OUTTA DA PILE.

profile_page.title: YER BOSS POLE
profile_page.loadout_description: STICK SHINY BITZ ON TA GET MORE DAKKA.

rewards_center.title: DA LOOT PILE
rewards_center.total_xp_label: TOTAL WAAAGH! FROM ALL DA ORKS
rewards_center.unclaimed_xp_description: STUFF YA EARNED FROM DOIN' JOBS. TAKE IT TA GET BIGGA.
rewards_center.error_loading: DA SQUIG AIN'T TALKIN' RIGHT NOW.
rewards_center.bounties_description: DO DIS STUFF, GET MORE WAAAGH!
rewards_center.ledger_description: A LIST OF ALL DA WAAAGH! YA GOT.

xp_history.deposit_bonus: Got {{amount}} WAAAGH! for sendin' boyz to Stompa {{vaultId}}.
xp_history.referral_bonus: Got {{amount}} WAAAGH! cuz yer boy {{username}} joined da fight.

stats.unrealizedPnlSubtext: LOOT FROM KRUMPIN' DAT'S STILL GOIN' ON.

notInvested.title: YA AIN'T GOT NO BOYZ IN DIS STOMPA.
notInvested.description: GO TO DA BOSS HUT AND SEND SOME BOYZ IN TA SEE DA FIGHT.
